query:
SELECT 
  'highlights' as type,
  COUNT(*) as count,
  MAX(id) as latest_id,
  MAX(created_at) as latest_time
FROM podcast_highlights
WHERE created_at >= '2025-01-25 10:30:00'
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'avatar_videos' as type,
  COUNT(*) as count,
  MAX(id) as latest_id,
  MAX(created_at) as latest_time
FROM avatar_video_tasks
WHERE created_at >= '2025-01-25 10:30:00';
